short_summary: Annual Fire Inspection, Periodic Sprinkler Inspections, and Annual Fire Hydrant Flow Tests \
description: The Correctional Service of Canada, Kingston Penitentiary, requires an experienced third-party Contractor to ensure that fire protection services are up to date with accurate reporting measures taken. The objectives are to perform annual fire alarm inspection, periodic sprinkler inspections, and the annual fire hydrant flow tests at Kingston Penitentiary as required under federal, provincial, and municipal legislation. The deliverables include annual fire alarm inspection reports, semi-annual sprinkler inspection reports, and annual fire hydrant inspection and flow test reports for 3 years.\
full_summary:
**Government Tender Announcement: Fire Protection Services - KP**

**Reference Number**: cb-475-20615723

**Publication Date:** 2024-06-04

**Tender Closing Date:** 2024-06-18T10:00:00

The Correctional Service Canada (CSC) is soliciting proposals for Fire Protection Services – Annual Fire Inspection, Periodic Sprinkler Inspections, and Annual Fire Hydrant Flow Tests at Kingston Penitentiary. The selected supplier will be responsible for providing experienced personnel and equipment to perform inspections and testing in accordance with relevant standards and regulations.

**Objectives:**

* Perform annual fire alarm inspection, periodic sprinkler inspections, and annual fire hydrant flow tests
* Provide all labor, materials, and equipment required to complete inspections and testing
* Maintain accurate records and provide detailed reports of inspections and deficiencies identified

**Scope of Work:**

* Annual Fire Alarm Inspection: 1 inspection per year for 3 years
* Periodic Sprinkler Inspections: 2 inspections per year for 3 years
* Annual Fire Hydrant Flow Test: 12 units per year for 3 years
* Provide final inspection reports for each type of inspection

**Requirements:**

* Experienced personnel with knowledge of fire protection systems and standards
* Ability to perform inspections and testing in accordance with CAN/ULC-S536 and NFPA 25
* Ability to provide detailed reports of inspections and deficiencies identified
* Ability to coordinate with CSC personnel and other stakeholders as required
* Familiarity with Johnson Controls (Tyco) fire alarm systems

**The CSC Contracting and Materiel Management Branch is seeking a supplier to provide Fire Protection Services to Kingston Penitentiary. The estimated contract value is not disclosed. The contractor will be responsible for the following:**

* Annual Fire Alarm Inspection: Inspect fire alarm systems to ensure they meet safety standards
* Periodic Sprinkler Inspections: Inspect sprinkler systems to ensure they meet safety standards
* Annual Fire Hydrant Flow Test: Test fire hydrants to ensure they meet safety standards

**Documents:**

* Tender Notice (English and French)
* Soliticitation Document
* Evaluation Criteria

Please refer to the attached documents for the complete tender package and evaluation criteria. Bidders may submit their proposals in either English or French.
